trait.name: Ranger
entries: {@optfeature Archery|phb}, {@classFeature Extra Attack|ranger|phb|5}, {@classFeature Favored Enemy|ranger|phb|1} ({@filter undead|bestiary|flsttype=undead} & {@filter construct|bestiary|flsttype=construct}), {@classFeature Primeval Awareness|ranger|phb|3}, {@classFeature Natural Explorer|ranger|phb|1} (urban, coast), {@feat Observant}, {@classFeature Land's Stride|ranger|phb|8}

trait.name: Fey Wanderer
entries: {@subclassFeature  Dreadful Strikes|ranger|phb|Fey Wanderer|tce|3}, {@subclassFeature Otherworldly Glamour|ranger|phb|Fey Wanderer|tce|3}

trait.name: Feywild Gifts
entries: Beauty Eye's shadow matches mimics his real emotions.

reaction.name: {@subclassFeature Beguiling Twist|ranger|phb|Fey Wanderer|tce|7}
entries: Whenever you or a creature you can see within 120 feet of you succeeds on a saving throw against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}, you can use your reaction to force a different creature you can see within 120 feet of you to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. If the save fails, the target is {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} by you (your choice) for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a successful save.
